name: Uhkapian Serpent
flavorText: The uhkapian serpent's venom weakens the veil between this world and the Unformed Land.
flavorTextHtml: The uhkapian serpent's venom weakens the veil between this world and the Unformed Land.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: 27% of the damage you take is redirected to your Zombie Dogs. (Witch Doctor Only) [25 - 30]%
